title: sakrecoer
author: sakrecoer
content: Proof-of-Less-Work (PoLW) is unique to Alephium. It allows for greater energetic efficiency without sacrificing decentralization.But how does it work? We sat down with Cheng Wang, inventor of PoLW and founder of Alephium, and had a long (and fascinating) discussion.https://medium.com/@alephium/tech-talk-1-the-ultimate-guide-to-proof-of-less-work-the-universe-and-everything-ba70644ab301
